name: Ejecta
description:
this is a game where asteroids try to kill you (for some reason)

CONRTOLS:

W to Move

ESC to go to main menu

R to Restart

HOW TO DOWNLOAD:

install the file "Ejecta.zip" below

go to your downloads folder and right click on the file "Ejecta.zip" and press "Extract "

or something similar

after that open the folder Ejecta then double click "ejecta.exe" and enjoy :)
